mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store( name, number, address, qr_code, phone, province, city, county, street, business_img, phoneTow )VALUE ( #{name}, #{number}, #{address}, #{qr_code}, #{phone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{street}, #{business_img}, #{phoneTow} )
mapper.select: SELECT store_id, name, number, address, qr_code, phone, province, city, county, street, business_img, phoneTow FROM store WHERE store_id=#{store_id}
SELECT store_id, name, number, address, qr_code, phone, province, city, county, street, business_img, phoneTow FROM store ORDER BY store_id DESC

SELECT s.store_id, s.name, s.number, s.address, s.qr_code, s.phone, s.province, s.city, s.county, s.street, s.business_img, s.phoneTow, ap.uid FROM store s LEFT JOIN sys_app_user ap on ap.store_id=s.store_id
